field.name: loai_duyet
field.check: loai_duyet not in (select loai_duyet from dmloaiduyet where status = '1')

field.name: status1
field.check: status1 not in (select u_status from dmttcttg where loai_duyet = #table.loai_duyet)

field.name: kieu_duyet
field.check: kieu_duyet <> '' and kieu_duyet not in (select ma_kieu from dmkieuduyet where loai_duyet = #table.loai_duyet)

field.name: status2
field.check: status2 not in (select u_status from dmttcttg where loai_duyet = #table.loai_duyet)

field.name: status0
field.check: status0 not in (select u_status from dmttcttg where loai_duyet = #table.loai_duyet)

processing.text: if @@admin = 0 and @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@@admin, @@userID, 'ApprovalRoles', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end declare @message nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(4000), @irregular nvarchar(4000), @irregularChars varchar(128), @field varchar(32), @r int, @d datetime select @irregularChars = &IrregularValue;, @d = getDate() select @irregular = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell có chứa các ký tự: ' + @irregularChars else 'The value of cell %invalidCell contains any of the following characters: ' + @irregularChars end select @duplicate = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell đã có hoặc lồng nhau.' else 'The value of cell %invalidCell is invalid or already exists.' end -- Delete if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a join dmquyen b on a.ma_quyen = b.ma_quyen and a.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet -- Checking if @$mode = 1 begin &IrregularMessage; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_quyen', stt, @message from @@table where ma_quyen like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%' &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'ma_quyen', @r = min(stt) from @@table where ma_quyen like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%'&Irregular; end &Checking; -- Gather select a.* into #k from @@table a join dmquyen b on a.ma_quyen = b.ma_quyen and a.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet delete @@table from @@table a join #k b on a.ma_quyen = b.ma_quyen and a.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet -- Checking select @field = 'ma_quyen' if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, ''00003'' from @@table a, @@table b where a.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet and a.ma_quyen <> b.ma_quyen and a.ma_quyen like rtrim(b.ma_quyen) + ''%'' &w1;@field, ''@@primaryKeyList''&w2;a.stt&w3;''00003''&w4; group by a.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, ''00003'' from @@table a, dmquyen b where a.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet and a.ma_quyen like rtrim(b.ma_quyen) + ''%'' &w1;@field, ''@@primaryKeyList''&w2;a.stt&w3;''00003''&w4; group by a.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, b.stt, ''00003'' from dmquyen a, @@table b where a.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet and a.ma_quyen like rtrim(b.ma_quyen) + ''%'' &w1;@field, ''@@primaryKeyList''&w2;b.stt&w3;''00003''&w4; group by b.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @q = 'select top 1 @r = a.stt from @@table a, @@table b where a.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet and a.ma_quyen <> b.ma_quyen and a.ma_quyen like rtrim(b.ma_quyen) + ''%''' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@r int output', @r = @r output&Duplicate; select top 1 @r = a.stt from @@table a, dmquyen b where a.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet and a.ma_quyen like rtrim(b.ma_quyen) + '%'&Duplicate; select @q = 'select top 1 @r = b.stt from dmquyen a, @@table b where a.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet and a.ma_quyen like rtrim(b.ma_quyen) + ''%''' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@r int output', @r = @r output&Duplicate; end &EndErrorMode; -- Insert select top 0 ma_quyen, ten_quyen, ten_quyen2, loai_duyet, cast(0 as int) as stt into #id1 from @@table select top 0 loai_duyet, ma_quyen, status1, kieu_duyet, status2, status0, deny_mail_yn, notify_mail_yn, created_mail_yn, parallel_yn, cast(0 as int) as line_nbr into #d1 from @@table select ma_quyen, loai_duyet, min(stt) as stt into #o1 from @@table group by ma_quyen, loai_duyet insert into #id1 select ma_quyen, max(ten_quyen), max(ten_quyen2), loai_duyet, min(stt) from @@table group by ma_quyen, loai_duyet insert into #d1 select a.loai_duyet, a.ma_quyen, a.status1, a.kieu_duyet, a.status2, a.status0, a.deny_mail_yn, a.notify_mail_yn, a.created_mail_yn, a.parallel_yn, a.stt - b.stt + 1 from @@table a join #o1 b on b.ma_quyen = a.ma_quyen and a.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet @@inserting(master); @@inserting(detail); -- Update if @type = '1' begin select top 0 ma_quyen, ten_quyen, ten_quyen2, loai_duyet, cast(0 as int) as stt into #id2 from @@table insert into #id2 select ma_quyen, max(ten_quyen), max(ten_quyen2), loai_duyet, min(stt) from #k group by ma_quyen, loai_duyet update dmquyen set @@list(master); from dmquyen a join #k b on a.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet and a.ma_quyen = b.ma_quyen join #id2 d on b.stt = d.stt truncate table #d1 select ma_quyen, loai_duyet, min(stt) as stt into #o2 from #k group by ma_quyen, loai_duyet insert into #d1 select a.loai_duyet, a.ma_quyen, a.status1, a.kieu_duyet, a.status2, a.status0, a.deny_mail_yn, a.notify_mail_yn, a.created_mail_yn, a.parallel_yn, a.stt - b.stt + 1 from #k a join #o2 b on b.ma_quyen = a.ma_quyen and a.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet delete dmquyenct from dmquyenct a join #d1 b on a.ma_quyen = b.ma_quyen and a.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet @@inserting(detail); if exists (select 1 from options where name = 'd_001' and val = '1') begin declare @id int, @minDate datetime, @maxDate datetime select @minDate = ngay_gh1, @maxDate = ngay_gh2 from dmstt select distinct user_id into #tduyet from dmduyet a join #k b on a.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet and a.ma_quyen = b.ma_quyen join #id2 d on b.stt = d.stt select @id = min(user_id) from #tduyet while @id is not null begin exec ds_InitVoucherPending @id, @id, @minDate, @maxDate, @@sysDatabaseName select @id = min(user_id) from #tduyet where user_id > @id end end end
